snippet.title: The Sims™ 4 Nifty Knitting Stuff Pack Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Craft your heart out in The Sims™ 4 Nifty Knitting Stuff Pack*, available July 28! Learn more here: http://x.ea.com/63694. 
 
In this artsy Community Voted Stuff Pack, Sims can needle their own clothes, toys, and knittable home decor! Take a seat in one of the new rocking chairs and start creating. When you’re done, pile your handcrafted styles onto your loved ones or turn a profit with the new online shopping platform, Plopsy. 
 
What delightful projects will your Sims take on?
 
Available July 28, 2020, on PC/Mac, Xbox One, and PlayStation®4.
 
Read the blog: http://x.ea.com/63694. 
 
*REQUIRES THE SIMS 4 ON APPLICABLE PLATFORM (SOLD SEPARATELY) AND ALL GAME UPDATES TO PLAY. FOR PC, SEE MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS FOR THIS PACK.

#sims4 #niftyknitting
